project_descr: A Bottom-up approach to ABS : Community level capacity development for successful engagement in ABS value chains in Cameroon.

outputs.output_descr: The principle of access and benefit sharing (ABS) of the value chain targeted by this project is based on Echinops giganteus and Mondia whitei.

document_name: Consultants to design a law on access to genetic resources and the fair and equitable sharing of benefits arising from their utilization
International Consultant to design a law on access to genetic resources.pdf
Recruitment of a Consultant for Development of a national communication plan and tools on ABS with a focus on Echinops giganteus and Mondia whitei
Recruitment of a Consultant for Elaboration of a Memorandum of agreement and mutually agreed terms for mondia whitei
Recruitment of a consultant for elaboration of a substantive report to set up a national system to document, maintain, protect and promote TK associated with genetic resources
Recrutement d'un consultant pour l'elaboration d?un guide technique sur les droits de la propriété intellectuelle,
project_title: a bottom up approach to access and benefit sharing
